Gallery.descriprion: "Chimpanzee from Kibale Forest national Park, Uganda"
"A female chimpanzee with a baby on mangrove trees. Republic of the Congo. Conkouati-Douli Reserve. An excellent illustration."
"A young "Chimp" (Common Chimpanzee, Pan troglodytes) is relaxing in a tree. SHOT IN WILDLIFE in Gombe Stream National Park in Tanzania."
"Close up shot of an adult Bonobo (Pan paniscus, Pygmy Chimpanzee) in DR Congo. This is a rare wildlife shot."
"A group of five adult chimps crossing a dirt road surrounded by green forest in natural sunlight, the chimps are almost in silhouette. One chimp is walking with human posture."
"Young Chimpanzee, Simia troglodytes, 5 years old, sitting in front of white background"
"Portrait of chimpanzee seating on a tree in the forest and looking up."
"Chimpanzee Pair Grooming One Another on a Rock"
"Young Chimpanzee Swinging on a Tree Branch"
"Common chimpanzee (Pan troglodytes), also known as the robust chimpanzee."
"Chimpanzee, pan troglodytes, Female with Young sitting on Grass"
"A young chimp clings to his mother walking upright through the thick foliage on Ngamba Island, a reserve for rescued chimpanzees in Lake Victoria, Uganda, Africa near Entebee."
"A family of "Chimps" (Common Chimpanzee, Pan troglodytes) is sitting on a tree. SHOT IN WILDLIFE in Gombe Stream National Park in Western Tanzania."
"Chimpanzee in water. The male of a chimpanzee runs in water and splashes the water, Congo Africa"
"Fighting chimpanzee bonobo ( Pan paniscus). Democratic Republic of Congo. Africa"
